name: CITY OF DOTHAN, AL
sampleDescriptions: FY22 Labor/HHS/Education Appropriations (FY22 Consolidated Appropriations Act - H.R. 4502) and FY22 Commerce/Justice/Science Appropriations (H.R. 4505), funding for projects.
